contract_system.description: The contract system allows players to create agreements for trading items, courier deliveries, and other services with escrow to guarantee fulfillment.

item_exchange.name: Item Exchange
item_exchange.description: Offer items for sale or request items at a specified price. The buyer pays ISK and receives the items.

courier.name: Courier Contract
courier.description: Request that items be transported from one station to another. The hauler provides collateral and receives payment on delivery.

auction.name: Auction
auction.description: List items for auction where the highest bidder wins. Requires a starting bid and optional buyout price.

escrow_mechanics.description: Escrow holds ISK or collateral to ensure contract fulfillment. Funds are released when the contract is completed or returned if the contract expires.
escrow_mechanics.buyer_escrow: ISK is held in escrow when a buyer accepts a contract. Released to seller on completion.
escrow_mechanics.courier_collateral: The hauler deposits collateral equal to the contract value. Returned on successful delivery, forfeited if the contract fails.
escrow_mechanics.auction_deposit: Bidders' ISK is held in escrow. Outbid amounts are returned. Winner's escrow is released to seller.
